Item ID6912

The teacher wand is a wand that can be wielded with 55 Magic. It can be obtained by either exchanging pizazz points at the Mage Training Arena or buying one from another player.

Purchasing the teacher wand from the Mage Training Arena requires an apprentice wand equipped or in your inventory and the following points:

Amount Task
150 Telekinetic pizazz points
200 Alchemist pizazz points
1500 Enchantment pizazz points
150 Graveyard pizazz points

From scratch, buying the teacher wand and the Beginner and Apprentice prerequisites wands requires:

Amount Task
240 Telekinetic pizazz points
290 Alchemist pizazz points
2400 Enchantment pizazz points
240 Graveyard pizazz points
